idea-plugin.name: ScriptAssistant
idea-plugin.description:
ScriptAssistant - A powerful tool designed for Android automation testers and developers to enhance efficiency in writing uiautomator2 scripts.

Key Features:

  • Automation Script Recording: Automatically generate uiautomator2 test scripts through simple operations, reducing manual coding work
  • Intelligent Code Completion: Provides smart suggestions and code completion features for uiautomator2 API
  • Development Efficiency Boost: Integrates multiple convenient tools to simplify the automation script writing process

This plugin aims to help developers and testers write and debug Android automation scripts more efficiently, especially for automation testing scenarios based on the uiautomator2 framework.

uiautomator2自动化脚本助手 - 专为Android自动化测试工程师和开发者设计的高效开发工具。

主要功能：

  • 自动化脚本录制：通过简单操作自动生成uiautomator2测试脚本，减少手动编码工作
  • 智能代码补全：提供针对uiautomator2 API的智能提示和代码补全功能
  • 提升开发效率：集成多种便捷工具，简化自动化脚本编写流程

此插件旨在帮助开发者和测试工程师更高效地编写和调试Android自动化脚本，特别适用于基于uiautomator2框架的自动化测试场景。
